task.title: How To Change or Cancel a Rental

context.p: If for some reason you need to adjust your resevation or cancel the classroom rental entirely, see the steps below.

step.cmd: Select the specific classroom rental you would like to change or cancel.
Select Change or Cancel based on your needs.

substep.cmd: After choosing Change, proceed to the drop-down bar for additional options.
Select fromChange Classroom, Change Date, or Change Time.
Follow the instructions on the webpage you are redirected to based upon your selection to adjust your reservation.
Once you are finished and satisfied with the new details of your rental, hit Save Changes to solidify and update your changes.
After choosing Cancel, proceed to the webpage you are redicrected to.
You will be asked to confirm the action of cancelling your reservation for certainty, select Yes, Cancel.
Hit Save Changes to update your profile to no longer showcase your rental.
